","sentences":"‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’

Members with young children often found it impossible to attend evening meetings.
^^有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。^^

^^他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。^^

^^根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。^^
